    • Method Detail

      • display

        public java.lang.String display(boolean back)
        Display the card. If back is false, the front of the card is display. If back is true, the back of the card is display with the information(s).
        Parameters:
        back - draw back or not.

        public Card setColorRevealed(boolean colorRevealed)
        Set the color of the card as revealed.
        Parameters:
        colorRevealed - true if the color has to be revealed, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the card in its new state.

      • setNumberRevealed

        public Card setNumberRevealed(boolean numberRevealed)

        Parameters:
